name: Protect the Wizard
description:
After many battles, the wizard and knight have confronted the evil witch. As the wizard charges the holy spell the knight prepares to protect the wizard from the witch’s minions…

Controls

Movement: WASD

Attack: LMB

Created for Fireside Jam 2022.

Developed with Godot, Photoshop and Bfxr.

Music by: Juhani Junkala https://juhanijunkala.com/
